# BNNS.ReductionFunction.maxIndex

**Case**

A function for reduction that computes the index of the maximum value.

## Declaration

```swift
case maxIndex
```

## Deprecated Symbols

- **BNNS.ReductionFunction.minIndex**: A function for reduction that computes the index of the minimum value.
